boss.wrathy_armament.johannes_fountain.d: The sun... I had forgotten how it feels
boss.wrathy_armament.sashakyotoz.appeare: On the fourth sleepless day, nightmare were visualized
death.attack.wrathy_armament.phantom_sho: Causes splash, that hits mobs within radius of 6 blocks
item.wrathy_armament.blackrazor_attack: Force and convert target's life into healing energy and a temporary boost of speed and strength for the wielder
item.wrathy_armament.blade_of_chaos_atta: Powerful attack, that launches enemies into air and fire them
Feel power of Kratos to manage Nemean crush, Cyclone of chaos and Wrath of artemis
item.wrathy_armament.frostmourne_attack: Summons a torrent of souls that rains down upon the battlefield
item.wrathy_armament.frostmourne_attack1: Killed undead enemy can arise to be your ally
item.wrathy_armament.game.master_sword: -Original from The Legend of Zelda series
item.wrathy_armament.half_zatoichi_attac: Hitting of enemy awards by regeneration, but switching of weapon takes it away
item.wrathy_armament.johannes_sword_dash: Push player forward to side of its view
item.wrathy_armament.johannes_sword_spea: Feel power of Johannes to spread spears above ground
item.wrathy_armament.left_hand: When player holds item in left hand:
item.wrathy_armament.master_sword_alter_: Turn owner of sword back in time to safer location
item.wrathy_armament.master_sword_attack: Channels the power of the wind, launching the player backward in the direction of their head rotation and leaves explosive wave of air
item.wrathy_armament.mirror_sword_mirror: Through the prism of sword, pierces hazards moving at player
item.wrathy_armament.mistsplitter_attack: Time of rest of sword converts in power of next attack
item.wrathy_armament.murasama_attack: Each hit of enemy in combo modify speed of sword's owner, stacks to 30%
item.wrathy_armament.phantom_lancer_circ: Creates explosion, that hits nearby mobs
item.wrathy_armament.phantom_lancer_swee: Shoots wave of small phantoms in range of 16 blocks forward to player's view
item.wrathy_armament.right_hand: When player holds item in right hand:
item.wrathy_armament.zenith_ability: When swung, the sword sprites of its component swords fly towards enemies
jei.wrathy_armament.blackrazor:
Epic sword from Baldur's Gate and D&D in general, 
suggested by sirdragonblaster to be added into mod. 
In mod can be obtained by taking it from stone handler 
in buried stone bricks structure in mountain biomes 
Attacks and abilities are added according to description 
of them on wiki and information given by sirdragonblaster
jei.wrathy_armament.blade_of_chaos:
Legendary blade from God Of War series 
implemented into mod from its context and look in God Of War 1
jei.wrathy_armament.frostmourne:
Legendary weapon from World of Warcraft series 
implemented into mod from scratch of its look. 
In mod can be obtained by slaying Lich King spawned 
in icecrown citadel structure in snowy plains biomes. 
Attacks and abilities are added according to description 
of them on wiki of WOW
jei.wrathy_armament.half_zatoichi:
Katana from Team Fortress 2 
implemented into mod from its look and gameplay with it. 
Attacks and abilities are added according to videos 
with using Half Zatoichi.
jei.wrathy_armament.johannes_sword:
Rogue Legacy inspired sword that Johannes, last boss 
in Rogue Legacy I, has in its arm when fighting player. 
In mod can be obtained by slaying Johannes 
in huge castle-like structure in plains biomes. 
Attacks and abilities are added according to attacks 
of Johannes in Rogue Legacy against player in final of game
jei.wrathy_armament.lunar_voodoo_doll:
Modified Guide Voodoo Doll. 
Doll can be dropped from Guide if player slayed him at night and moon is visible. 
Once thrown into water, Moon Lord will be spawned if sky is visible and it's night time
jei.wrathy_armament.master_sword:
Sword from The Legend of Zelda series. 
In mod can be obtained by taking it from stone handler 
in muddy structure in mangrove swamp biome. 
Attacks and abilities are added according to description 
of them on wiki of The Legend of Zelda
jei.wrathy_armament.mirrow_sword:
Weapon made up by Habciak, Polish translator of mod, 
with idea to reuse taken damage. 
In mod can be obtained by slaying Habciak in his cuboid
structure in desert biomes
jei.wrathy_armament.mistsplitter_reforge:
Weapon from Genshin Impact, 
suggested by ash_ketchum0401 to be added into mod. 
Attacks and abilities are added according to description 
of them on wiki and information given by ash_ketchum0401
jei.wrathy_armament.murasama:
Powerful katana-like weapon from Metal Gear series 
implemented into mod from scratch of its look. 
Attacks and abilities are added according to description 
of them on wiki of Metal Gear. 
Easter egg: rename blade into Muramasa, and it'll change
jei.wrathy_armament.phantom_lancer:
First weapon that was added to the mod. 
In itself presents mix of scythe and glaive from Minecraft Dungeons. 
In mod can be obtained by slaying SashaKYotoz in phantom 
armor that appears each 4th night which player doesn't sleep
structure.wrathy_armament.protection: Structure, reinforced by magic, cancels this action
